description: This table stores updates made to community resource recommendations for a patient. Each update to a CRC record is represented by a new row in this table with a new contact date.

columns.name: RECOMMENDATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the recommendation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which this contact was created.

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of creation of this contact.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


MyChart


Healthy Planet Link


External Portal

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The patient encounter from which this contact was created.

columns.name: DOCUMENTING_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who was responsible for the creation of this contact.

columns.name: USAGE_CRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The usage of this community resource recommendation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Recommended


In Use


Won't Be Used


Completed


Cancelled

columns.name: NOT_USED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason that this community resource was not utilized by the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CBO Declined


Request Forwarded


Patient Not Eligible


Patient Declined


Does not meet patient's needs

columns.name: COMPLETED_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The outcome of this completed community resource recommendation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Needs Met


Needs Not Met


No Longer Needed


Can No Longer Use


Request Forwarded

columns.name: COMMENT_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The HNO CSN of the comment associated with this community resource recommendation.

columns.name: HISTORIC_YN
columns.description:
Whether the community resource is historic (Y) or current (N).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HIST_LINE_OV_IDENT
columns.description: The historical line for information associated with the community resource's contact (stored in related group EPT 34000). Use this column, in conjunction with column CREATING_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID in table COMMUNITY_RESOURCE, to join to DP_FACILITY, which contains more information on the community resource's contact.
